stateDiagram

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : RELEASED_DEBOUNCE

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59; #125;

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; press_status = false#59; #125;

RELEASED_STABLE

RELEASED_STABLE : RELEASED_STABLE

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : PRESSED_DEBOUNCE

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; timer_ms = 0#59; #125;

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; press_status = true#59; #125;

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : enter / #123; press_event = true#59; #125;

state PRESSED_STABLE {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as PRESSED_STABLE.(InitialState)

        CONFIRM_LONG

        CONFIRM_LONG : CONFIRM_LONG

        PRESSED_LONG

        PRESSED_LONG : PRESSED_LONG

        PRESSED_LONG : enter / #123; long_event = true#59; #125;

        PRESSED_LONG : enter / #123; long_status = true#59; #125;

        PRESSED_LONG : exit / #123; long_status = false#59; #125;

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

RELEASED_DEBOUNCE --> RELEASED_STABLE : do [timer_ms > 50]

RELEASED_STABLE --> PRESSED_DEBOUNCE : do [input_active]

PRESSED_DEBOUNCE --> PRESSED_STABLE : do [timer_ms > 50]

PRESSED_STABLE --> RELEASED_DEBOUNCE : do [! input_active] / #123; release_event = true#59; #125;

PRESSED_STABLE.(InitialState) --> CONFIRM_LONG

CONFIRM_LONG --> PRESSED_LONG : do [timer_ms > 1000]

ROOT.(InitialState) --> RELEASED_DEBOUNCE
Events
settings
